participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and optimistic, Emily enjoys exploring new ideas and is passionate about her future in education.
participant_1.background: I like visiting art museums in my spare time. I just started dating someone new. I'm in an education program, and hope to teach kindergarten when I graduate. I am a vegan. I'm a student.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, Jake enjoys storytelling and the outdoors, with a fondness for music from his youth.
participant_2.background: Under a pen name, I write romance books. This past summer I hiked the Appalachian Trail. I have a terrible singing voice. I used to follow the Grateful Dead when they toured. I am a short order cook at a local diner.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a short order cook at a local diner.
Oh, that sounds like a fun job. I like to cook too.
Me too! I've been cooking since I was a kid.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I like to make breakfast food. I make a mean omelet.
I love omelets! I'm a vegan, so I don't eat eggs, but I love the way they smell.
Oh, that's too bad. I love eggs. But I've been trying to eat more vegan food lately.
That's good. I think everyone should try to eat more plants.
I agree. It's good for your health and the environment.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and hike.
I like reading too. I'm reading a book about the Grateful Dead right now.
Oh, I love the Grateful Dead! I used to follow them when they toured.
That's so cool! I've never seen them live, but I've heard they're amazing.
They are. I saw them a few times in the '80s and it was always a great experience.
So, what do you like to write?
I write romance novels under a pen name.
Oh, that's cool. I've never written a book before, but I've always wanted to.
You should give it a try. It's a lot of fun.
I might just do that. Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem. It was nice talking to you.
You too.
